Posts.Content: It is not an easy decision but in my case when I saw moderate to promisingÂ  shrinking of my tumor I even asked my oncologist once if we could go back to the more toxic-chemotherapy eventhough some of them are more unpleasent than others. besides water, one of my doctors insisted on protecting myself from sunlight after the more toxic chemotheraphies, as my symptoms keep on changing yogurt and probiotics have helped me...
Posts.Title: Petrified of getting chemo
